#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#define DRT()     int t;scanf("%d",&t);while(t--)
#define MIN(a,b)  (a)<(b)?(a):(b)
#define MAX(a,b)  (a)>(b)?(a):(b)
#define MOD       1000000007
int a[10000001];
int main()
{
    int i= 0,j=0;
    int n,t=0;
    for(i=0;i<10000001;i++)
        a[i]=1;
    a[0] = 0;
    a[1] = 0;
    for(i=2;i<(10000001);i++)
			{
				if(a[i])
				{

					for(j=2*i;j<10000001;j+=i)
					a[j]=0;
				}
			}


   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
       scanf("%d",&n);
       if(a[n]==1)
        printf("Yes\n");
       else
        printf("No\n");
   }
 return 0 ;

}
